mapper.select: /* B_Listener.xml - callGiftList */ call rd_admin.sp_admin_broadcast_room_gift_history(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

/* B_Listener.xml - callGiftList_thumbnail */ select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rowNum, c.* FROM ( SELECT a.userId, a.nickName, a.`level`, a.`grade`, a.giftDate, b.item_image AS itemImage, b.item_name AS itemName, a.accumCnt, item_thumbnail ,itemCnt FROM (SELECT mem_userid AS userId , mem_nick AS nickName , mem_level AS `level` , mem_grade AS grade , last_upd_date AS giftDate , item_code, accum_cnt AS accumCnt , item_cnt as itemCnt FROM rd_data.tb_member_broadcast_item where room_no = #{room_no} AND item_type = 1) AS a LEFT JOIN rd_data.tbl_gift_item AS b ON a.item_code = b.item_code ) AS c, (select @rownum := #{pageNo} ) AS d ORDER BY c.giftDate DESC limit #{pageNo}, #{pageCnt}
